trans-unit.target: The install tool has been locked

For security reasons, the install tool has been locked after a wrong password had been entered more than three times in a row. To unlock it, open the local configuration file and set installCount to 0.
PHP is not allowed to write files!

Your server does not support file access via PHP; most likely PHP runs as Apache module under a different user. Please contact your server administrator and ask him to fix the problem. Do not attempt to fix this yourself by making files and folders writable for everyone!
